name: Crazy Jungle
description:
Crazy Jungle

Crazy Jungle is a single player puzzle game. The player's goal is to complete three puzzles to get the gems needed to break the main character's curse, as well as avoiding or knocking down the enemies by possessing them.

In addition, as a secondary mission, you can search for the bananas hidden through the island.

Will you be able to solve all the puzzles and find all the bananas? This game was developed in 4 weeks by 4 university students using Unreal Engine 4. Hope you enjoy it! Development Team Artists

Teodora Dobre @teodora_dobre
